name: They came from above (to steal our dang fish)
name_original: They came from above (to steal our dang fish)
description:
PLAY FULLSCREEN!

Made for mini jam 91 (Theme: UFO, Limitation: Fish as a mechanic).

Move with arrows or A-D,  shoot with space, R to go back to the menu.
Shoot the UFOs down to stop them from stealing your fish, and gather all the worms around the pond to destroy the mothership. You'll automatically attack the mothership every time you gather 4 worms.
